- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.50.1b4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tweakers.net/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy

_No response_

comment.body:
After adding all the rules, the console errors disappear but the tab still doesn't activate. 

However if I remove all the new rules, go back to the original condition, hit 'Empty Caches' on the Develop menu (Option/Command/E), then refresh the page the tab will work. 

Refresh the page again and the tab stops working once more. 

That process is repeatable. Empty Caches followed by refresh reactivates the tab. Refresh on its own stops it working. 

Very odd.

issue.title: online.cosmosbank.in

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://online.cosmosbank.in/RetailCorporate/#/login/retailcorporate](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonline.cosmosbank.in%2FRetailCorporate%2F%23%2Flogin%2Fretailcorporate) ### Comment Username: @chintan124 > 1. URL that i am trying to access : https://online.cosmosbank.in/RetailCorporate/#/login/retailcorporate > The Problem : This page is NOT getting loaded only on Adguard DNS. > Solutions that i have tried which have not worked : > 1. disable all blocklists on my adguard private dns server > 2. whitelist this particular domain (cosmosbank.com, cosmosbank.in, cosmosbank.co.in) on my adguard private dns server > 2. www.cosmosbank.com Main homepage. then Click on "Netbanking Login" > 3. Opening this page fails when I am using Adguard DNS --- Screenshot attached > 4. This page loads when I connect to Any VPN not using Adguard DNS (Private) or even Google DNS (8.8.8.8). A screenshot of this same page loaded using Surfshark VPN or Google DNS is attached ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/VRB5HG0.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/8tdEjpJ.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Adguard DNS Browser: | Safari Filters: | Other:
AdGuard DNS

comment.body:
Hello,

    On my mac i do have Private DNS setup inside the AdGuard settings and
it is DNS over https. However, i have other devices which do not have
AdGuard installed but are connected to the router which has Private DNS set
up, and they are not able to access this link as well. But they can access
it if they connect to a VPN.

   This suggests that the problem is with the AdGuard Private DNS server. I
think that I had tried it once before and i can access this website over
AdGuard Public DNS.

    So the problem is with the AdGuard Private DNS server that i am using.



On Thu, 22 Jun 2023 at 1:58 AM, jellizaveta ***@***.***>
wrote:

> @chintan124 <https://github.com/chintan124> Is your private DNS set up in
> your AdGuard settings?
>
> 
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/154195#issuecomment-1601625247>,
> or unsubscribe
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AKFJGWVZ6YT2ETTSGDTK6PDXMNKN3ANCNFSM6AAAAAAZMUP75E>
> .
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID:
> ***@***.***>
>
-- 

Best Regards,

Chintan K. Athalye

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.quora.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.quora.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @jeffgerickson > The screenshot says it all. With AdGuard enabled on quora.com, it is not possible to access the formatting tools or to post questions, posts, or answers. This applies both to new content and to editing old content. (it is still possible to submit and edit comments, but that uses a different editor.) This behavior is less than 36 hours old. > > This smells to me more like intentional behavior by Quora than a bug in AdGuard, but I thought you should be notified anyway. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/7UTotFs.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/FN9TQOs.jpg)
